Text.Page:
Huh?

I'm not hiding anything! I mean: Who are you?
You can't just take someone else's stuff!<TEXTBUTTON>Show me what you were trying to hide.</TEXTBUTTON><NEXTPAGEBUTTON>Don't make this difficult...</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Okay! Okay! Don't kill me!

It's just a cameo pendant that I found.)Let me see inside it.
(It's an image of Syona and another elin, standing side by side.)I know who this belongs to. Thanks!
